table.name: gtm_tr_other_control
table.description: Table to store Control Screening details for the Control Category - 'OTHER'

columns.name: GTM_TR_OTHER_CONTROL_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line control code for other control screening.

columns.name: GTM_TR_OTHER_CONTROL_XID
columns.description: The XID for the GTM trade transaction line control code for other control screening.

columns.name: GTM_TRANSACTION_LINE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule set group used to assign the control type/control code for other control screening to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule used to assign the control type/control code for other control screening to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: GTM_CONTROL_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the control type assigned to the GTM trade transaction line for other control screening.

columns.name: CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: The control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line.

columns.name: AUTHORIZATION_TEXT
columns.description: The authorization information entered by a user to release the control assigned to the GTM trade transaction line during other control screening.

columns.name: AUTHORIZATION_ADDED_BY
columns.description: The user who submitted the authorization.

columns.name: AUTHORIZATION_ADDED_ON
columns.description: The date the authorization was submitted.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: Database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the user who updated the other control screening data.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent update for the other control screening data.

columns.name: GTM_EXCEPTION_CONTROL_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the exception control type assigned to the GTM trade transaction line during other control screening.

columns.name: GTM_EXCEPTION_CONTROL_CODE
columns.description: The exception control code assigned to the GTM trade transaction line during other control screening.

columns.name: EXCEPTION_COMPLIANCE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The GID for the compliance rule used to assign the exception control type/control code to the GTM trade transaction line for other control screening.
